item.description:
I am living and working in Colgone (Germany) as a Systems Architect. At work I am creating high available infrastructure with technoligies like Kubernets, AWS, Terraform and a lot more.

When not working I am using my free time to learn Golang which is powering all these awesome tools.

You can find me on several local (Cologne) Meetup groups:

  • Golang Colgone/Bonn
  • Kubernetes Meetup Cologne
  • Cologne AWS User Group #AWSUGCGN

To Recruiters:

My next goal is to work with Golang in a professional way. The position should also be a remote only position in a remote first company.

If you have something meeting this requirements feel free to contact me.
